name: A Short Tail
description:
Our first attempt at a 2D platformer.

Wimpy and Scrimpy are gonna be hungry when they wake up from their kip. Get oot there and nab a chicken!

WASD or arrow keys to move, space bar to jump, E to pick up and drop apple

For some reason, in the web version, the jump pads are not rendering in! Just know that they are cute bouncy mushrooms!  Or download the desktop version to see the great job our wonderful animator did and enjoy this Short Tail in it's full glory!

Thanks for art to:

Animal sprites by Elthen's Pixel Art Shop - itch.io  

Tileset by Free Pixelart Tileset - Cute Forest by aamatniekss (itch.io)

Heart sprite by https://xxashuraxx.itch.io/heart

Roast chicken sprite from https://ghostpixxells.itch.io/
